relation: University System of Maryland Foundation, Inc.
International Council for the Life Sciences
To support an international symposium to explore the opportunities and challenges posed by the emerging field of synthetic biology.
To provide renewed support for the development of Interpol's capacity to counter bioterrorism by raising awareness, developing police training programs and strengthening law enforcement.
To prevent bioterrorism by raising awareness of the potential for misuse of biotechnology research.
To engage and survey the scientific community on biosecurity issues.
To support further development of an institutional framework to prevent deliberate or inadvertent use of biological pathogens for destructive purposes.
To renew support for efforts to raise awareness in the bioscience community about issues of dual-use research
To provide partial support for Biosafety and Biosecurity International Conference (BBIC) 2009
To engage the international scientific community on Biosecurity issues.
To renew support for the Center for Biosecurity.
